1.0.name: wordpress/mountain
1.0.description: Mountain is simple, lightweight, box shaped, and adaptable WordPress Theme for bloggers and professionals. It is Responsive Web Design to view in various devices. Reasons to use Mountain Theme :Responsive Web Design, supports sticky notes with special effects, Custom Menu, Easy Theme Options, Social Links (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Youtube & RSS).
